title: Discovery of Demand
text: Discovery of collective demand, or collective discovery of demand found useful to introduce new artists to the neighbourhood and help enrichment of local artistic fusion, starting of conversations and bridging cultures. We are not efficiently aware, whether people outside of our social reach, residing in the same neighbourhood/city or not, would be interested for a potential good, service or experience (eg. future concert, exhibitions of artists or their performing genres), in a desired level of anonymity.
